trans-unit.source: At the beginning of the end step, if you control no creatures, sacrifice Thran Quarry. {T}: Add one mana of any color.
Serra Avatar's power and toughness are each equal to your life total. When Serra Avatar is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

trans-unit.resname: PSUS·3 | Lord of Atlantis | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

trans-unit.resname: PSUS·3 | Lord of Atlantis | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A master of tactics, the Lord of Atlantis makes his people bold in battle merely by arriving to lead them.
White creatures get +1/+1.
{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Lyrist: Destroy target enchantment.
"Make me thy lyre, even as the forest is: What if my leaves are falling like its own!"\n—Percy Bysshe Shelley,\n"Ode to the West Wind"

trans-unit.resname: PSUS·6 | City of Brass | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

trans-unit.resname: PSUS·6 | City of Brass | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Enter this palace-gate and ask the news Of greatness fallen into dust and clay."\n—*The Arabian Nights*, trans. Burton
Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to any target.
Cast the weight as though it were a die, to see a rival's fate.
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Flying Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Two-Headed Dragon can block an additional creature each combat. {1}{R}: Two-Headed Dragon gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Haste Whenever Slith Firewalker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
The slith incubate in the Great Furnace's heat, emerging on Mirrodin's surface only when the four suns have aligned overhead.
{T}: Destroy target tapped creature.
Trained in the arts of stealth, royal assassins choose their victims carefully, relying on timing and precision rather than brute force.
Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
There were no tombstones in orochi territory. Slain warriors were buried with a tree sapling, so they would become a part of the forest after death.

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Sacrifice Shard Phoenix: It deals 2 damage to each creature without flying. {R}{R}{R}: Return Shard Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your upkeep.
Protection from red Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
"In Rath," the priest said, "there is even greater need for prayer."
Protection from black At the beginning of each end step, if Whirling Dervish dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Amid this whirling hurricane of blades, there is no calm eye in which the hapless can find shelter.
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
The songs of angels are perceived not as words in the ears but as stirrings in the soul.
Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
"We've endured your slights to Gaea with the grace of tolerance. Now behold the grace of our ferocity."
Other Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Regenerate another target Goblin.
One part cunning, one part wise, and many, many parts demented.
